top_categories.workout_context: Reliance Tennessee Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Reliance Tennessee Gravel’s appalachian foothills, forest gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Reliance Tennessee Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Reliance Tennessee Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Reliance Tennessee Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Reliance Tennessee Gravel’s appalachian foothills gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Reliance Tennessee Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Reliance Tennessee Gravel’s appalachian foothills gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Reliance Tennessee Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
The varied gradients at Reliance Tennessee Gravel reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Reliance Tennessee Gravel — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on appalachian foothills gravel.
Every session at Reliance Tennessee Gravel intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Reliance Tennessee Gravel’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Reliance Tennessee Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on appalachian foothills gravel to build confidence. Expect: appalachian foothills, forest gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 75 miles of appalachian foothills gravel in Reliance, Tennessee.
